original_text: Yes, I am against those who have dreams and use them to deceive people. They are using cruel lies to lead the people away from me. I did not send those prophets to speak on my behalf. They do nothing to help my people.’ That is what the Lord says. Yes, I am against those who have dreams and use them to deceive people. They are using cruel lies to lead the people away from me. I did not send those prophets to speak on my behalf. They do nothing to help my people.’ That is what the Lord says.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 보라 거짓 꿈을 예언하여 이르며 거짓과 헛된 자만으로 내 백성을 미혹하게 하는 자를 내가 치리라 내가 그들을 보내지 아니하였으며 명령하지 아니하였나니 그들은 이 백성에게 아무 유익이 없느니라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: Yes, I am against those who have dreams
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 나는 꿈을 가진 자들을 대적하노라

sentences.original_text: and use them to deceive people
to lead the people away from me
I did not send those prophets

sentences.korean_translation: 나를 대신하여 말하게 하려는 것이 아니니라

sentences.original_text: They do nothing to help my people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내 백성을 돕는 것을 전혀 하지 않느니라

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says

sentences.original_text: and use them to deceive people
to lead the people away from me
I did not send those prophets

sentences.original_text: They do nothing to help my people

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says
